attributes.action: ban the use of the font Comic Sans by all government departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Comic sans is a font originaly released by Microsoft for use in cartoon strips.  We the undersigned believe that it is obsurd that government bodies, such as the School Teacher's Review body should be issuing advisories in this font.  We believe that this serves only to undermine the content of the document.  

We petition the Prime Minister to issue advice to government bodies recommending against the use of this font in official publications.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
